project.name: J-C606A-POIX-09-ST03-DT03-DF18-CF07-01
project.description: The product does not properly check inputs that are used for loop conditions, potentially leading to a denial of service because of excessive looping. This test will try to access a user-controlled file, repeatedly trying if the access fails. The user provides an intentionally bad path, forcing the software to wait forever.

iopair.name: J-C606A-POIX-09-ST03-DT03-DF18-CF07-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: convert a .doc to HTML Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="/etc/passwd" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

iopair.description: extract a .xls file to csv Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="tempfile.txt" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="doesntexist.txt" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(grep -E """^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$""" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_ojzHj4b6Y4mpB4jywWOE AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_iK3zcPUPFQ OR (NOT (finished_65NE9KUf4n AND finished_OgOAuwCfRM) AND NOT (controlled_exit_IVVV9EjBLc OR continued_execution_BRWcYDejEg)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_iK3zcPUPFQ OR (NOT (finished_65NE9KUf4n AND finished_OgOAuwCfRM) AND NOT (controlled_exit_IVVV9EjBLc OR continued_execution_BRWcYDejEg))) OR controlled_exit_IVVV9EjBLc)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_iK3zcPUPFQ OR (NOT (finished_65NE9KUf4n AND finished_OgOAuwCfRM) AND NOT (controlled_exit_IVVV9EjBLc OR continued_execution_BRWcYDejEg)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_iK3zcPUPFQ OR (NOT (finished_65NE9KUf4n AND finished_OgOAuwCfRM) AND NOT (controlled_exit_IVVV9EjBLc OR continued_execution_BRWcYDejEg))) OR controlled_exit_IVVV9EjBLc))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "Found file." "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(/bin/grep -E 'Reading ".+"' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
